The pousada has a restaurant. A quite varied menu, -most dishes for two at around R$ 30.
There is only one lodging, but a private room might be arranged.

value: directions=On the beach, at the north end of the settlement.
price=Single R$ 70, double R$ 110, triple R$ 140. These prices include transport to/from Porto dos Tatus. Bargain for any stay longer than one night.
